content:
alexcrichton opened Issue #2361:

We've already got a FIXME in the code so I'd like to go ahead and create a tracking issue for supporting this.

Currently wasmparser should have all the validation done for us, but there's translator and runtime work that needs to be done to support the memory64 wasm proposal.

alexcrichton labeled Issue #2361:

We've already got a FIXME in the code so I'd like to go ahead and create a tracking issue for supporting this.

Currently wasmparser should have all the validation done for us, but there's translator and runtime work that needs to be done to support the memory64 wasm proposal.
